document.full_text: - chinese and south korean leaders chatted with evacuees and tasted local produce in japan's battered northeast on saturday, in a show of support for a nation struggling with a humanitarian and nuclear crisis set off by a deadly earthquake and tsunami in march.
document.title: china and south korea leaders visit fukushima in show of support
lines_and_colors: - chinese and south korean leaders chatted with evacuees and tasted local produce in japan's battered northeast on saturday, in a show of support for a nation struggling with a humanitarian and nuclear crisis set off by a deadly earthquake and tsunami in march.
